name: Phoenix Vs Jellyfish
description:
There are too many jellyfish. These beings have developed the hability to fly and they are terrorizing the people with their toxic clouds. Only the phoenix has the capacity to stand against the jellyfish forever.

This videogame was developed for the seventh edition of Game Jam Alicante:

http://www.gamejamua.com/

Controls:

  • Space: Start the game
  • Left arrow: Turn left
  • Right arrow: Turn right

Version 1.1

  • Improved the graphics contrast and feedback.
  • Respawn of the elements always visible for the player.
  • Improved the difficulty balance.
